full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,CHOS SKYONG LCAM SRING 'KHOR BCAS LA TSOGS MCHOD 'BUL BA'I KHYER BDE ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @006A *, ,(CES CHOS SKYONG DREGS PA LCAM SRING LA TSOGS MCHOD 'BUL BA'I KHYER BDE BA 'DI NI, JANG JING CHING WANG GI MNGA' 'BANGS TSUL KHRIMS RNAM DAG PAS MI PHYED PA'I, DAD PA DANG LDAN PA SNYUNG GNAS PA DGE SLONG BLO BZANG SHES RAB NANG GSO RTZIS KYI BLO RIG DANG LDAN PA TIM CHI BLO BZANG NGAG DBANG DANG, DGE SLONG SANGS RGYAS RNAMS NAN TAN GYIS BSKUL BA'I NGO BSRUNG BA'I PHYIR DU, BYANG PHYOGS BSTAN PA'I GSAL BYED DZA YA PAndI TA MTSAN GZHAN BLO BZANG SNYAN GRAGS DGE LEGS RNAM DPAL BZANG PO'I SLOB MA THA SHAL PAS, BLO BZANG @006B DPAL MGON MING CAN GYIS CHOS SKYONG DREGS PA LCAM SRING DANG CHOS SKYONG GZHAN LA TSOGS MCHOD 'BUL BA'I CHO GA MI MTHONG ZHES BLA MA YI DAM RNAMS KYIS TSOGS MCHOD RNAMS YID SHES KYIS, 'GREN NAS BRIS PA'I 'DI LHAG CHAD MA DAG PA DANG TSUL MIN PA'I NYES SKYONG GZHAN LA THAMS CAD BLA MA LHA TSOGS DANG KHYAD PAR LCAM SRING 'KHOR BCAS LA BZOD PAR GSOL, SGRIB PAR MI 'GYUR BAR MDZAD DU GSOL, ,GAL TE LEGS CHA CUNG ZAD YOD NA DE DGOS SOGS SEMS CAN THAMS CAD KYI DAM TSIG NYAMS CHAGS SDIG SGRIB RNAMS BYAD ZHING DAG NAS, BSTAN 'GRO'I PHAN PHYIR DU MCHOG MTHUN GYI DNGOS GRUB THOB PA'I RGYU RU BSNGO, ,BKRA SHIS PAR GYUR CIG ,DGE'O, ,)
author_simple: BLO BZANG DPAL MGON MING CAN,
